title: Manager, Product Management
description: Leading product initiatives across marketing and data platforms. Unified engagement data across business lines, launched a $3MM NPV paperless campaign, and improved platform resiliency by reactivating over 1MM valid emails while optimizing AWS and Databricks infrastructure.

title: Senior Product Manager
description: Managed a team of six and led the implementation of a serverless AWS architecture. Drove product strategy for an AI-enabled underwriting tool, partnered with sales and marketing to accelerate deal closures, and delivered $8M in AWS cost savings through data analysis and platform consolidation.

title: Product Manager
description: Defined product vision and roadmap for a new B2B SaaS platform, launching it to $250K+ in first-year revenue. Shipped major features for MassMutual’s new business platform, including a new submission flow with 30% adoption in the first week. Led feasibility analysis, vendor partnerships, and executive-level communication.

title: Software Engineer
description: Built and shipped features for MassMutual’s insurance platform using Angular and Node. Advocated for and contributed to a shared front-end design system to improve consistency and developer velocity.

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed high-volume, multi-million dollar loan applications using React and Node. Led architecture discussions, created reusable components for the design system, and collaborated closely with product and design teams in an Agile environment.
